commands.command: SMART TASK DETECTION: 1) Read .claude/.actions.json (recent actions), 2) Read docs/TASKS.md incomplete tasks (pattern: `- [ ] ID **Desc**`), 3) Match actions against task descriptions using keyword extraction (see .claude/lib/smart-detector.md algorithm), 4) For matches >70% confidence, present batch confirmation: 'Detected task X.X complete (85% confidence). Update TASKS.md? [YES/NO]'. 5) If YES, call task-tracker agent to execute 4-step update.
commands.description: Automated task detection via action analysis
